pullrequest.title: My first commit: started fixing a bug in LinkInspector!

content.raw:
It would probably be easier to open a separate pull request for Gazebo 7. You can:

1. Change to the Gazebo 7 branch
1. Apply the changes
1. Compile and check it worked (beware that Gazebo7 has different dependencies)
1. Create a branch, commit and open a PR

Let me know how it goes!
content.html:
It would probably be easier to open a separate pull request for Gazebo 7. You can:

  1. Change to the Gazebo 7 branch
  2. Apply the changes
  3. Compile and check it worked (beware that Gazebo7 has different dependencies)
  4. Create a branch, commit and open a PR

Let me know how it goes!
